entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Read_Archive_File failing due to access denied to tar/pax/file.tar #68357
  • System.Text.Json incremental source generator performance issues #68353
  • System.TimeOnly: Compact round-trip format #68348
    Future
  • Empty string literals in Marshal.cs #68347
  • Get rid of IHealthChecksBuilder.AddTypeActivatedCheck<T> in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.HealthChecksBuilderAddCheckExtensions #68344
  • Add common test for getting all types in each runtime library implementation assembly #68341
  • Windows: Implement a way to enable color in console even when the output is redirected #68340
  • [API Proposal]: Add ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfZeroLength() #68339
  • Investigate size increase for Android libmonosgen-2.0.so between net6.0 and 7.0 #68330
    7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAny on more than 5 chars #68328
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Convert argument null checks to ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #68326
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Improve default sort algorithm #68325
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.MyVideos) returns empty string in OSX #68323
  • macOS / Mac Catalyst / iOS: CurrentThread.Current[UI]Culture is always the invariant culture #68321
    6.0.x
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68318
    7.0.0
  • Unable to assign values to struct properties #68316
  • [NativeAOT arm64] application using sha1 and sha2 Instruction Sets does nothing and quits #68315
  • CertificateSelection callback is not called when client use Unified framing #68310
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support ref fields in System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder #68309
  • `System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont` cannot switch automatically according to the system and Do some reflections #68335
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\shortenregisteredlocal\\shortenregisteredlocal.cmd #68306
    7.0.0

Closed

  • GetActiveTcpListeners is not implemented on FreeBSD #64416
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #67216
    7.0.0
  • WriteEventCore with DateTime has changed behavior in .Net 6.0 #61563
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support uint for System.Diagnostics.Metrics instruments #68021
    7.0.0
  • Allow lazy-loading of referenced assemblies in Mono AOT #66361
    6.0.x
  • [devloop] Debug build linker errors in tests on Unix #68279
  • Attempting to write schema to writer throws exception #66557
  • segfault in libcoreclr.so`CallDescrWorkerWithHandler #66970
    7.0.0
  • Assembly.GetTypes fails on System.DirectoryServices assembly #68240
  • C++ cli reference .net 5/6 which reference .net standard2+ not working on Windows #68261
  • ConfigurationBuilder add elements to initialized array instead of replacing it #36569
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `HttpResponseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode(HttpStatusCode statusCode)` #67478
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IsPlusAddress property for MailAddress #68296
    7.0.0
  • Pass more info about matching mode to Regex engine #67980
    7.0.0
  • SEGFAULT due to tiered compilation on 32 bit RASPBIAN .net 6.0 Builds #67102
  • How to build a project using locally built ILCompiler? #68257
  • Is the enumeration order of the Stack<T> collection well defined? #68317
  • Unable To Read Locked File In Linux #34126
    Future
  • NetFramework 4.6.1 to 4.8 with System.Net.Http regression #65005
  • System.Text.Json is unable to deserialize FluentValidation.Results.ValidationResult #68280

PullRequests

Created

  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
  • Update Android Docker build image #68354
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Remove MarshalUsingAttribute when System.AggressiveAttributeTrimming is on #68350
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, linkable-framework
  • Remove unused libs.packages subset #68345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove SystemNative_GetUnixName() PAL function #68342
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Backport new Tar APIs #68337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Ensure floating-point types write the exponent/significand as little-endian #68331
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] Do not reset assigned interval twice #68327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Remove DEBUG_ARG_SLOTS #68319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add support for parsing empty user and password as DefaultCredentials #68312
    area-System.Net.Http
  • fixes in transition blowup and removing recursion from RegexNode conversion #68307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Update area-owners.md #68356
    area-Meta
  • Use "..."u8 to simplify some `ReadOnlySpan<byte>` constructions #68334
    area-Meta
  • Disable UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes on Mac #68346
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Delete some dead code #68333
    area-Meta
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Rev TraceEventVersion to 2.0.77 #68167
    test-enhancement, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add System.Formats.Tar assembly to NetCoreAppLibrary.props #68343
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix locking around m_LoaderAllocatorReferences iteration #68336
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable new CA1311 (ToLower/Upper culture) and CA1852 (seal internal/private types) rules #68268
    area-Meta
  • perf: Fix issues caused by a shared `dotnet` in helix correlation payload directory #67792
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • Embed an informational built-by string in JIT #68329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use _ASSERTE in runtime tests #68299
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • upgrade docker to get clang9 to prevent coreclr crashes #68311
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect definition of LSA_FOREST_TRUST_RECORD in System.DirectoryServices #68274
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Add missing Android/tvOS optimization for OperatingSystem.IsOSPlatform() #68313
    area-System.Runtime
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Pass more information about execution mode to RegexRunners #68242
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix ILCompiler using wrong ISA for LZCNT #68324
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not reset assigned interval twice #68305
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added `TestEventListener` #68273
  • Add more details to NativeAOT workflow doc #68308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add more diagnostics to LookupProperty (more diagnostics to flaky tests) #68281
    area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-asmdiffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing #68258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, 7.0.0
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • [draft][mono] merge wasm-threading-eventpipe into main #68232
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Added Fixes for LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests and Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #68303
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Preserve FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs ctor #68265
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • fix(wasm): Discriminate satellite assemblies loading based on culture #68195
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Do not use '.NET Core' anymore in error messages #68260
    area-Host
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #65785
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • If the user has < 65 cores and passes in an affinitized range for the 0th CPU group, if valid, honor it. #68283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add Windows and Ubuntu perf runs on Ampere hw #68304
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [zlib] Bump to upstream 1.2.12 #68219
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
